description:
As we have unfortunately had to cancel our Lightning Talks night, we still wanted to provide an opportunity for people to get together if they wanted.

Join us for a PHPSW Social at Small Bar on Wednesday evening. We'll provide the first couple of drinks and then discuss whatever topics you want to.

We're not going to provide any food/pizza, so please grab some beforehand or there is food available to order at Small Bar too.

--
As always, a big thanks to our meetup sponsors Ents24 (http://www.ents24.com/), Brightpearl (http://www.brightpearl.com/) & OneSub (https://onesub.io/) without whom we wouldn't be able to put on our meetups.
title: PHPSW Social
